word:
A Call to Self-denial. Brother Wessels, God is calling upon His 

                                     -91- 

people to deny self. We appeal to men, women, and children to deny themselves every indulgence, and use in God's service the money thus saved through self-denial. Let every one pray earnestly to God for complete victory over self-indulgence and self-worship. If Christ, the Majesty of heaven, gave up so much for us, shall we withhold our lives from Him, and tread a path of selfish indulgence and gratification?
